channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Road continues to flood here despite 2024 drain cleaning ‘exercise’, 15th July
item.description:
As in previous years…..road flooding: potential hazard……suspect drain channel is STILL silted up…… As per attached 8am Tuesday 8 July photos……

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lubbock Road, Elmstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown trees, 15th July
item.description:
The trees down Frobisher Street are very overgrown, particularly by no. 5-11 Frobisher Street. Please can you arrange for these to be cut back. Thank you.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Frobisher Street, East Greenwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Alleyway blocked with dumped rubbish behind 12 Mellington Court, Benthal Road, N16 7ST", 15th July
item.description:
I am writing to report a serious issue regarding the condition of the alleyway located at 12 mellington court benthal road London N16 7st The passageway is completely obstructed by a large amount of rubbish and abandoned items including wooden planks,

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Benthal Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The bushes especially on Cumberland Road are halfway into the pavement., 15th July
item.description:

item.title: Tree overhangs into road and two properties, 15th July
item.description:
Tree overhangs into two properties damaging planting plus it overhangs low into the road. As it is a lime tree it produces a sap which means that cars cannot park under it without fear of getting their cars covered. Can it please be pollarded?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Princes Avenue, Poverest, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken/missing manhole cover, 15th July
item.description:
Previously reported on case ref 7875390 but closed as they could not find the problem. It is located in between 77-79 Sherwood Park Avenue, Sidcup, DA15 9HU and still needs fixing. There are cones round the manhole

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 79, Sherwood Park Avenue, Blackfen, Sidcup, London

item.title: Broken drain cover near zebra crossing (Sainsbury’s), 15th July
item.description:
Drain cover broken, deep hole exposed large enough to trip and cause injury. Passer by reported observing a recent accident of someone falling and resulted in injury. Located opposite Sainsbury’s petrol garage on pavement through car park to store.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Southend Lane, Perry Vale, London
Report on FixMyStreet
